Os nad chi sydd i fod i dderbyn yr e-bost hwn, a wnewch roi gwybod i bwy bynnag wnaeth ei anfon trwy e-bost a dinistrio pob copi.  Ni chaniateir agor, defnyddio, datgelu, storio na chopor e-bost.  Barn neu sylwadaur awdur ywr rhai sydd yn yr e-bost ac nid ydynt o anghenraid yn cynrychioli barn Bwrdd Iechyd addysgu Powys heblaw bod hynny wedii nodi.  Maen bosibl y gellir datgelir wybodaeth sydd yn yr e-bost hwn dan Ddeddf Rhyddid Gwybodaeth 2000, Rheoliadau Gwybodaeth Amgylcheddol 2004 a Deddf Diogelu Data 1998.  Oni bai bod y wybodaeth wedii heithrio rhag cael ei datgelu dan y gyfraith, ni allwn sicrhau cyfrinachedd yr e-bost hwn ac unrhyw ateb iddo.  
Cyn agor yr e-bost hwn ac unrhyw atodiadau, a wnewch eu gwirio rhag firysau gan nad ywr Bwrdd Iechyd yn gallu sicrhau nad ydynt heb firws ac nad ydynt wediu rhyng-gipio nau diwygio.

I received this email but the product that was shipped is not what I 
ordered.  My order number is #2140, for a Trailer Valet RVR, which I 
paid $179.00 US.  The item that I was shipped is a pair of lights that 
attach to a vehicle's tires and light when the vehicle is in motion.  
The customs form on the package has a value of $9.00 US.  This is 
clearly not what I ordered.

Please issue a refund for $179.  Thanks for your help.

--Steve Shoyer

> Hi I have bought three of your scooter and the first one I purchased was a cost of $159.00 and the other two have cost me $99.99 I wanted to know if I can have a refund for the difference. Or can I cancel the first order and repurchase one.

Well. I am being scammed aren't I? You have sent me a watch and I know it
is your company because whoever is sending out the rubbish items such as
thus intelligence health bracelet was too lazy to take off the label from
underneath which states electric scooter.

Now, please send me my scooter, whichbi hope is as advertised and which is
the item I bought otherwise o shall notably report you for fraud to my
bank, which I have, but I shall report you to the police.

Correct this situation.

You can arrange to have the watch picked up, at your expense, as no never
ordered it, but before you do no want the scooter or a refund. Up to you
which. But you had better let me know before the end of tomorrow.

The product description on the label below is: electric smart scooter. Odd
as the value states 5.36.

So you have either bought a scooter with my money and sent me a rubbush
watch instead so thay you can make profit on the scooter by selling it to
someone else whilst keeping my money? Or?

Attached is a picture of the item you have sent.

Also attached is a copy of my order to you.

I would suggest you sort this out straight away. You have until tomorrow
and of business day UK time.

I hope I make myself clear.

Regards
Charlie Sadler

column4:
My Shipping order of November 20th 2018... carbon mini folding
 bicycle
column6:
Hello,

on 20st of november 2018 I have made two orders and payments within about half an hour.
I hope to get an answer for my seccond order that I have purchased.

For my first order and payment, the e-scooter, I have gotten an e-mail that confirmed my order and payment.

But after having payed the seccond order of a foldable carbon mini bycicle that I have also payed about 20 minutes after, I have not gotten an e-mail.

I have checked the payment on my online visa banking counter and it said that the seccond payment has been done too.

But I never got an e-mail about the order, the payment and also not that it has been sent.

I would like to know if it was sent out too and hope to read back from you as soon as possible.

My best regards and wishes for first advent.


Kerstin Njoya





Von Samsung-Tablet gesendet

Dear Sir/Madam,

I ordered an item from promallforbuy.com on 19 November. I got two email confirmations (attached), which led me to a site confirming that the shipment was on its way. Today, when going to check on my order, the links do not work but instead the promallforbuy.com-site seems to not exist.

The links found in the attached confirmations are the following: https://www.promallforbuy.com/8601272379/orders/322862266f6300e27b03d86a30cbef0a/authenticate?key=0276a83e6e4cdecd827144178d90d50f and https://www.promallforbuy.com/8601272379/orders/322862266f6300e27b03d86a30cbef0a/authenticate?key=0276a83e6e4cdecd827144178d90d50f; seem to be identical.

I need confirmation asap that this is a legitimate purchase; a working link to a well-known tracking system and other possible assurance, or otherwise I will dispute the charge with my bank tomorrow.

Regards,


Jussi Sarvikivi

Hola.
Me gustaría preguntarles si es posible comunicarnos en español porque mi
inglés es muy básico.

Si la respuesta es "SI", quiero preguntar por algún detalle más respecto de
la moto que anunciáis en Facebook.

- Cuántos c.c. es la moto?
- Tienen alguna moto similar de 125 c.c.?
- Velocidad máxima en Km/h?
- En pendientes ascendentes, tiene buen
   rendimiento?
- Tiempo de carga total?
- Cuántos kms puedo hacer con la batería al 100%?
- Tiene garantía?
- En caso de algun problema mecánico: Hay algún centro Mecánico para su
reparación?
- cuál es el importe total a pagar de la moto en euros, entregada en la
puerta de mi casa?

Atentamente.

Gerardo
+34625765454
Turís-Valencia-Spain


-------------(English Google translate)----------

Hi.

I would like to ask you if it is possible to communicate in Spanish because
my English is very basic.


If the answer is "YES", I want to ask for some more detail regarding the
bike that you announce on Facebook.


- How many c.c. Is it the motorcycle?

- Do you have a similar bike of 125 c.c.?

- Maximum speed in Km / h?

- On ascending slopes, it has good

performance?

- Total charge time?

- How many km can I do with the battery 100%?

- Do you have a guarantee?

- In case of a mechanical problem: Is there a mechanical center for repair?

- What is the total amount to be paid for the bike in euros, delivered at
the door of my house?


Best regards.


Gerardo

+34625765454

Turís-Valencia-Spain
